basics.name: Kevin Colmenares
basics.label: +2 Full Stack Developer years experience
basics.summary: +2 years experience as a developer. I am a responsible person, works well in a team, responsible, focused on improving day after day, always looking to learn new things.

work.name: Smart Trading Indicators
work.summary: As a full-stack programmer, I spearheaded the development of a user-friendly chatbot interface, utilizing my expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. My contributions enabled seamless user interaction, efficient data processing, and integration with various business systems.

work.name: Directa Group
work.summary: As a web scraping analyst programmer, I maintained and enhanced a suite of JavaScript-based web scraping bots, ensuring their efficiency and accuracy in extracting valuable data from various websites. My contributions streamlined data collection processes and provided valuable insights for business decision-making.

work.name: Directa Group
work.summary: As a team lead, I spearheaded the development of various web projects, effectively managing a team of developers and collaborating closely with stakeholders. My expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, and AWS cloud services enabled me to deliver high-quality, scalable web solutions that met business requirements.

work.name: Arötech
work.summary: As a skilled front-end developer, I leveraged my expertise in PHP, Laravel, and Blade templating to craft engaging and user-friendly web interfaces. My contributions extended beyond front-end development, encompassing back-end tasks that ensured seamless integration and data management.

projects.name: Product Matching
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web interface that facilitated product matching requests. The interface enabled users to submit requests, view matching results in clear tabular formats, and seamlessly integrate with existing business workflows.
